"/face6 I don't think we can keep going...

"The target is within trap range!
Now! Activate the trap!"

"You have good timing.
Now you just have to get the target

"/face4 You can't use the trap right now!

"/face2 Target captured!

"/face4 Oh dear. You failed to capture the target.

"/face4 Oh! Wait! Wait!
The goal is simply to capture the target.
Do not attack it!"

"/face6 The target creature's vital signs have gone flat.

Perhaps next time."

"The teleporter is overheating.
This is the last attempt we can make.
You'll have to be very careful."

なんとか誘導して、捕獲を

"/face2 対象の捕獲成功ですー！

"/face6 こ、これ以上は無理みたいですー……
通常の任務に戻っちゃってください。"

"対象を捕獲有効範囲内に捕捉！

"タイミングはいいですよー。

"/face2 対象の捕獲、成功です－！

"/face4 あっ、ああっ、捕獲失敗です！

"/face4 あのっ、あのあのっ！
目標はあくまで捕獲ですよー！

"/face6 捕獲対象の生体反応、消失……

"転送装置がちょっとキツそう……
